name: Triage
description: The Pokemon feels the urgency to treat the injured; it is also very quick to stitch and make knots. A skill often used to instantly mend wounds.
effect: The User may declare and use any move that restores HP or cure Status Conditions to themselves or allies as if it had Priority +1. Add +1 to the healing of the User's HP restoring moves. This bonus only applies on the first Round of activation for moves which heal the character at the end of Round.
